conbody.p: Katalon TestOps Continurous Integration (CI) is an easier way to execute Katalon Studio tests remotely or schedule remote Katalon Studio execution. See Test Planning Overview for detailed information.
This step-by-step guide shows you how to install the Katalon for Azure DevOps extension and run Katalon projects with Azure DevOps.

ul.li: An active Katalon Runtime Engine license.
